name: 64 FREE Emoji Asset Pack
description:
Asset Pack Info

This is a 16x16 Pixel Pack.

This is week #2 of me trying to release a pack every week for 52 weeks. Here's the results, hope you can find some use for them. If you do, let me know in the comments :)

Pack Contents

This pack contains 64 16x16 Emojis. It also includes a blank sheet in case you want to make your own emojis.
